result.eng: Do you mean to carry on?
result.ga: An bhfuil sé i gceist agat leanúint ar aghaidh
result.orig: An bhfuil sé i gceist agat leanúint ar aghaidh
result.html: An bhfuil sé i gceist agat leanúint ar aghaidhDo you mean to carry on?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil sé i gceist agat leanúint ar aġaiḋDo you mean to carry on?

result.eng: Continous work will be involved to reach the target.
result.ga: Beidh obair leanúnach i gceist chun an sprioc a bhaint amach
result.orig: Beidh obair leanúnach i gceist chun an sprioc a bhaint amach
result.html: Beidh obair leanúnach i gceist chun an sprioc a bhaint amachContinous work will be involved to reach the target.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ obair leanúnaċ i gceist ċun an sprioc a ḃaint amaċContinous work will be involved to reach the target.

result.eng: Excuse me? What do you mean?
result.ga: Gabh mo leithscéal Cad atá i gceist agat
result.orig: Gabh mo leithscéal Cad atá i gceist agat
result.html: Gabh mo leithscéal Cad atá i gceist agatExcuse me? What do you mean?
result.ponchtml: Gaḃ mo leiṫscéal Cad atá i gceist agatExcuse me? What do you mean?

result.ga: Is é a bhí i gceist agam ná
result.orig: Is é a bhí i gceist agam ná
result.html: Is é a bhí i gceist agam náWhat I meant was...
result.ponchtml: Is é a ḃí i gceist agam náWhat I meant was...

result.eng: He meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.
result.ga: Ní sláinte an choirp amháin a bhí i gceist aige ach sláinte na haigne chomh maith
result.orig: Ní sláinte an choirp amháin a bhí i gceist aige ach sláinte na haigne chomh maith
result.html: Ní sláinte an choirp amháin a bhí i gceist aige ach sláinte na haigne chomh maithHe meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.
result.ponchtml: Ní sláinte an ċoirp aṁáin a ḃí i gceist aige aċ sláinte na haigne ċoṁ maiṫHe meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.

result.eng: We are planning to launch the product soon.
result.ga: Tá sé i gceist againn an táirge a sheoladh go luath
result.orig: Tá sé i gceist againn an táirge a sheoladh go luath
result.html: Tá sé i gceist againn an táirge a sheoladh go luathWe are planning to launch the product soon.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé i gceist againn an táirge a ẛeolaḋ go luaṫWe are planning to launch the product soon.

result.eng: One [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.
result.ga: Shíl láithreoir amháin nach raibh eitleán ar bith i gceist agus go mba bhuama é
result.orig: Shíl láithreoir amháin nach raibh eitleán ar bith i gceist agus go mba bhuama é
result.html: Shíl láithreoir amháin nach raibh eitleán ar bith i gceist agus go mba bhuama éOne [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.
result.ponchtml: Ṡíl láiṫreoir aṁáin naċ raiḃ eitleán ar biṫ i gceist agus go mba ḃuama éOne [TV] presenter thought there was no airplane involved at all, and that it was a bomb.
